sentences.sentence: In our times, human shrewdness has mastered the deep mysteries of the earth at a level far beyond the capacities of earlier peoples.
sentences.translation: 在我们这个时代，人类的精明已足以掌握地球的深层奥秘，其程度远远超过了早期人类的能力。

sentences.sentence: You underestimate his endurance, and I his shrewdness.
sentences.translation: 你低估了他的耐力，而我低估了他的精明。

sentences.sentence: While the sacking of Mark Hughes was ruthless, it appeared to have an icy shrewdness.
sentences.translation: 炒掉马克·休斯固然无情，却似含有一种冷酷的精明。
